sentences.en: ...events that range from athetics to soccer, rugby and hockey.
sentences.cn: …比赛项目包括田径、足球、橄榄球和曲棍球。
…参加大学校际体育运动的学生们。

sentences.en: As the modern Olympics grew in stature, so too did athletics.
sentences.cn: 随着现代奥林匹克运动会声名远扬，田径运动也越来越受关注。

sentences.en: Athletics South Africa was formed by an amalgamation of two organisations.
sentences.cn: 南非体育协会由两个组织合并而成。

sentences.en: Athletics'anti - dope campaigners are faced with a credibility problem.
sentences.cn: 田径运动的 反 兴奋剂倡道者面临信誉问题.

sentences.en: It's the last but one day in the athletics programme.
sentences.cn: 那是田径比赛结束的前一天。

sentences.en: Kenya's long distance runners have taken the athletics world by storm.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚的长跑运动员在田径界获得了巨大成功。

sentences.en: Livingston faces a four-year disqualification from athletics.
sentences.cn: 利文斯顿面临禁止参加田径比赛4年的处罚。

sentences.en: My school did nothing whatsoever in the way of athletics.
sentences.cn: 我的学校在体育方面无所作为。

sentences.en: Our team tied with theirs in athletics.
sentences.cn: 在田径比赛中,我们队与他们队旗鼓相当.

sentences.en: Robb is torn between becoming a doctor and a career in athletics.
sentences.cn: 罗布在做医生还是当运动员之间痛苦抉择，左右为难。

sentences.en: Speed is the essential ingredient of all athletics.
sentences.cn: 速度是所有田径运动项目的关键要素。

sentences.en: students involved in all forms of college athletics
sentences.cn: 参加各种大学体育运动的学生

sentences.en: The stadium emptied at the end of the first day of athletics.
sentences.cn: 首日比赛结束后，体育场空无一人。

sentences.en: When I was at school I was always hopeless at athletics.
sentences.cn: 我上学的时候体育十分糟糕.

sentences.en: You've given a lifetime of service to athletics.
sentences.cn: 你为田径运动贡献了一生。

trans.tran_cn: 体育运动，田径运动，竞技，体育（课）
trans.tran_en: sports such as running and jumping
